citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 - 13:00
on 19-Nov-18.
After knocking on the door, calling the contact number (left message) and waiting for one half hour, no responsible
person was present to conduct an inspection.

narrative:
